name: recompile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to compile a computer program (= change it into a machine language) for a second, third, etc. time: It should be able to run all modules already released without requiring developers to recompile their code. A good habit is to fix the first error listed and then recompile.
More examplesFewer examplesIf you want to change your connection settings, you must edit and recompile this file.It can be updated interactively without the need to recompile.It is necessary to recompile the driver to run correctly in the processor.
